backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, categories, and articles with admin/user authorization and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light/dark modes and global background/text settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
Route guard that checks authentication and admin permissions before rendering admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/layout/CategoryN: Navigation component fetching and displaying news categories with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, social links, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link including dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with logo, category navigation, login/admin controls, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area using a full-height flex layout.
frontend/src/components/news/ArticleCard: Displays a clickable article preview card showing image, category, date, title, excerpt, and author.
frontend/src/components/news/ArticleList: Offers search input and sort selector controls for filtering and ordering article lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for checking admin status and managing the callerâ€™s user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useArticle.ts: Fetches a single article by ID using the current backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useArticles.ts: Supplies hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting articles with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Provides hooks to list, create, update, and delete categories while managing related query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state, login/logout, and related status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, color variables, dark mode values, and typography defaults for the site.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility helpers for merging class names and formatting bigint timestamps into readable dates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminArticlesPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting articles with a dialog form and table view.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for managing categories, including creation, editing, and deletion via a dialog and table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Wraps admin pages with navigation links for articles and categories.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article with category, metadata, image, and full content, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows articles filtered by category with search and sort options, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Lists all articles with search and sorting, showing a hero banner and handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, theme extensions (colors, fonts, animations), custom container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project state, including features, requirements, pending requests, and image asset needs for the Sanukhabar news portal.
